November 15, 2024 - Pool Corporation was founded in 1980 as South Central Pool Supply by Frank J. St. Romain. In 1993, the company was purchased by Code Hennessey's & Simmons. In 1995, the company was renamed SCP Pool Corporation and became a public company via an initial public offering.
